results.name: First differences of A169707.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
formula: It appears that a(n) = 4*A160552(n), n >= 1. - _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 13 2015
example: Written as an irregular triangle in which row lengths are 1,1,2,4,8,16,32,... the sequence begins:
It appears that the row sums give A000302.
It appears that the right border gives A173033.
